page.title: 15Games Children Play
page.content: GAMES CHILDREN PLAY:in school-cricket. CRICKET:the season starts at about late April and ends in September.In a cricket team there are 11 players.The game is played with a ball about the size of a clenched fist.The order of play:the bowler runs up to the wickets and bowls.If the batsman hits it into the air the ball can be caught and the player is 'out'.If the ball passes the boundary then it scores 4 runs.If the batsman hits it fairly far he can run, meaning to go from one set of wickets to the other.The batsman is out when a)the ball hits the wickets b)the batsman obstructs the ball from hitting the wickets c)the ball hits the wickets in the middle of running d)the ball is caught without bouncing having hit the bat. (Mark)
